scripts.deploy:hardhat: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network hardhat deploy --tags hardhat
scripts.deploy:mainnet: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network mainnet deploy --tags mainnet
scripts.deploy:polygon: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network polygon deploy --tags polygon
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network arbitrum deploy --tags arbitrum
scripts.deploy:optimism: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network optimism deploy --tags optimism
scripts.deploy:base: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network base deploy --tags base
scripts.verify:mainnet: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network mainnet etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:polygon: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network polygon etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:arbitrum: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network arbitrum etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:optimism: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network optimism etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.verify:base: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network base etherscan-verify --license None --force-license
scripts.coverage: rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf test/types && hardhat compile --config hardhat.test.config.ts && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/hardhat/internal/cli/cli.js coverage --max-memory 4096 --config hardhat.test.config.ts
scripts.coverage:fast: rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf test/types && hardhat compile --config hardhat.test.config.ts && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/hardhat/internal/cli/cli.js coverage --max-memory 4096  --config hardhat.fast-test.config.ts
scripts.lstrategy-slippage: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --config hardhat.test.config.ts lstrategy-slippage --tickchange 100 --erc20ratio 5 --percentagechange 90
scripts.lstrategy-backtest: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --config hardhat.backtest.config.ts lstrategy-backtest --filename price_data.csv --width 60 --weth 10 --wsteth 10
scripts.forge:deploy:pancake: forge script --use 0.8.9 src/script/DeployPancakeVault.s.sol:DeployPancakeVault --rpc-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.forge:deploy:base:pulse-v2: forge script --use 0.8.9 src/script/base/DeployUniPulseV2.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep BASE_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.forge:deploy:base:balancer: forge script --use 0.8.9 src/script/base/DeployBalancerCSP.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep BASE_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.forge:deploy:base:balancer-v2: forge script --use 0.8.9 src/script/base/BalancerCSPVault.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep BASE_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.forge:deploy:base:oracle: forge script --use 0.8.9 src/script/base/DeployOracle.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $(grep BASE_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep BASE_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.forge:deploy:balancer-v2: forge script --use 0.8.9 src/script/BalancerV2Deployment.s.sol:BalancerV2Deployment --rpc-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv

scripts.forge:deploy:mainnet:aura: forge script --use 0.8.9 ./src/script/mainnet/AuraDeployment.s.sol:AuraDeployment --rpc-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
